name: @yousolution/node-red-contrib-you-graphql-timeout
description: A Node-RED node to make GraphQL calls

scripts.update: npm pack && mv yousolution-node-red-contrib-you-graphql-timeout-$npm_package_version.tgz ./data && cd data && npm i yousolution-node-red-contrib-you-graphql-timeout-$npm_package_version.tgz && docker-compose restart
